channel.title: AI-Pulse - Stock Market & Finance
channel.description: Stock Market & Finance news from AI-Pulse

item.title: Palo Alto Networks’ earnings are on deck. Here’s what could get the stock going again.
item.description: Palo Alto Networks shares have been caught up in the software selloff, but analysts are upbeat about recent momentum for its firewall business and the future impact of acquisitions.

item.title: Buying stocks everyone loves is a recipe for underperformance — but Apple breaks the rule
item.description: Unloved companies with rock-bottom expectations are the real engines of your portfolio.

item.title: General Mills cut its sales outlook to mark the fifth birthday of its ‘growth’ strategy
item.description: General Mills’s stock was set to fall after the full-year profit and sales outlook were lowered, as the consumer recovery has been slower and has cost more than expected.
